alert.note: Alert for Clackamas (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 08 at 4:48PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Oregon, including the following counties, Clackamas, Multnomah and Washington. * WHEN...Until 745 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 447 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Portland, Beaverton, Tigard, Lake Oswego, Milwaukie, Garden Home-Whitford, Metzger, West Slope, Oatfield, Powellhurst- Centennial, Happy Valley, King City, Raleigh Hills, Sellwood, Cedar Hills, Oak Grove, Aloha and Sunnyside. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
